rules_text:
Draw a card, gain 3 life, then make a pledge. [i](Create any white Clique enchantment token. If you already control a Clique, instead activate its Pledge without paying its cost.)[/i]
If you've cast four or more spells named Incumbency this game and there are five colors among permanents you control, you win the game.
notes:
Art Validated
